product_name: Maui Jim World Cup Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Featuring patented polarized lens technology, the Maui Jim World Cup Polarized Sunglasses help protect your eyes from glare and UV rays while maintaining a sleek appearance and comfortable fit. PolarizedPlus2 lenses eliminate 99.9% of glare; patented multilayer design and lens treatment maximize color transmission and enhance visible color. Waterproof, oil-resistant coating sheds water and repels grease and smudges. Matte Black Rubber and Marlin frames feature Neutral Grey lenses for bright, direct sunlight; they offer rich color and contrast along with very high light production. Chocolate Stripe Fade frames feature HCL (High Contrast Lens) Bronze lenses for added contrast on overcast or foggy days; subtle bronze tint is ideal for variable sunlight. With a center thickness of 1.8mm, SuperThin glass lenses are 20% thinner and lighter than standard laminated glass lenses for long-wearing comfort. Anti-corrosive spring hinges; embedded rubber nose pads. Modified rectangle frames are lightweight and tough with superior fit and comfort. The Maui Jim World Cup Polarized Sunglasses come with a case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: Featuring patented polarized lens technology, the Maui Jim World Cup Polarized Sunglasses help protect your eyes from glare and UV rays while maintaining a sleek appearance and comfortable fit.
